metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsFirewallInfoV2_CL 
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Computer, Profile
| where Enabled != 1                   // 1=Enabled
| where DefaultInboundAction != 4      // 4=Block
| where DefaultOutboundAction != 2     // 2=Allow
| where AllowInboundRules != 1         // 1=True
| summarize total = count()
","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-demo1-p"],"visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}},"name":"INCOMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | COUNT"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsFirewallInfoV2_CL 
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer, Profile
| where Enabled == 1                   // 1=Enabled
| where DefaultInboundAction == 4      // 4=Block
| where DefaultOutboundAction == 2     // 2=Allow
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"COMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | LIST","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-demo1-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"green"}},"showBorder":true}},"name":"COMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | LIST - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsFirewallInfoV2_CL 
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Computer, Profile
| where Enabled != 1                   // 1=Enabled
| where DefaultInboundAction != 4      // 4=Block
| where DefaultOutboundAction != 2     // 2=Allow
| where AllowInboundRules != 1         // 1=True
","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"INCOMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | LIST","noDataMessageStyle":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-demo1-p"]},"name":"INCOMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | LIST"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsFirewallInfoV2_CL

| where Enabled == 1                   // 1=Enabled
| where DefaultInboundAction == 4      // 4=Block
| where DefaultOutboundAction == 2     // 2=Allow
","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"COMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | LIST","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-demo1-p"],"gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000,"filter":true}},"name":"COMPLIANT WINDOWS FIREWALL | CLIENTS | LIST"}],"isLocked":false,"fallbackResourceIds":["Azure Monitor"],"fromTemplateId":"ArmTemplates-/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-managed-dashboards-workbooks/providers/microsoft.insights/workbooktemplates/WINDOWS FIREWALL - CLIENTS - V2"}
